title: U.S. general warns of Russia’s enduring space threat despite Ukraine woes
summary: Gen. Stephen Whiting: In the space domain “Moscow will remain a formidable and less predictable challenge to the United States”

title: Space Force’s weather-imaging mission takes flight again after initial setback
summary: The Electro-Optical/Infrared Weather Systems cubesat gets a second chance a year after a previous mission failed to deploy

title: Bridging the cultural divide for moon to Mars
summary: Achieving NASA's moon-to-Mars (M2M) goals will require a collaborative culture shift among engineering, science, and human spaceflight teams.

title: Terran Orbital wins $15 million contract for U.S. Space Force satellite experiments
summary: The contract was awarded by Axient, a company that manages satellite experiments for the Air Force Research Laboratory

title: Daily Telescope: A new Webb image reveals a cosmos full of galaxies
summary: See a galaxy as it was just 430 million years after the Big Bang.
